packets research lab

We are a research lab based at the School of Engineering and Informatics, University of Sussex. Our ambition is to design robust and efficient networks for the future.

We conduct trans-disciplinary research at the intersection of computer networks, machine learning, complex systems and software verification, with a focus on network protocol design, management and verification. Our funders include EPSRC, Innovate UK and Moogsoft.

Details of our research can be found in the projects page.

We have extensive experience in successfully delivering collaborative research and consultancy projects and we are always open to exciting collaborations with academia and industry. Do contact us if you want to discuss opportunities for collaboration.
